  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(ProcessPluginApi api, Variables variables) throws ErrorBoundaryEvent, Exception
      Parameters:
      api - not null
      variables - not null
      Throws:
      ErrorBoundaryEvent - to trigger custom error handling flow in BPMN, when using DefaultServiceTaskErrorHandler
      Exception - to fail the FHIR Task and stop the process instance, when using DefaultServiceTaskErrorHandler
